潪字的基本解释

潪
zhí
水稍渗入土中。

潪
zhì
水名。

潪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhè］
［《廣韻》直炙切，入昔，澄。］
(1)水稍渗入土。
(2)同“宅”。
[②]［zhì］
［《廣韻》智義切，去寘，知。］
水名。

潪字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潪； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页650第09
【廣韻】直炙切，音擲。【說文】土得水沮也。本作?，或省作潪。　又【廣韻】竹隻切【集韻】竹益切，?音嫡。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?知義切，音智。水名。

潪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
潪字的起名意思

暂无。

潪
Basic explanation of words
潪
zhí
The water seeps slightly into the soil.
潪
zhì
Water name.
潪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhè］
["Guangyun" straight cut, into the past, clear. ]
(1) Water slightly penetrates into the soil.
(2) Same as "House".
[②]［zhì］
["Guangyun" Zhiyi cut, set, know. ]
Water name.
潪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　潪; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 650 09
[Guang Yun] Cut straight and cut with sound. [Said the text] soil gets water and ju also. This is for?, or for the province.　[Guangyun] Bamboo only cut [Jiyun] Bamboo benefit cut,? Sound divine. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Knowing the meaning, sound wisdom. Water name.
潪
